topics.name: customer_events
topics.description: Kafka topic to capture the customer events such as location updates or profile updates

topics.name: product_events
topics.description: Kafka topic to capture the product events. This topic will get updates on products decription, price etc.

topics.name: shop_updates
topics.description: Kafka topic to get any shop updates such as new products, location

topics.name: shop_products
topics.description: Kafka topic to get products in a shop. This is constantly updating

topics.name: orders
topics.description: All the order events on our online store

topics.name: sales
topics.description: All sales related events gets captured in this topic

topics.name: avro_record
topics.description: All Avro record related events gets captured in this topic

topics.name: json_schema_record
topics.description: All Json Schema record related events gets captured in this topic

topics.name: address_book
topics.description: All Protobuf record related events gets captured in this topic

topics.name: customer_contacts
topics.description: Kafka topic to capture the customer contacts such as email, phone
